title: Hyperfiniteness on Topological Ramsey Spaces
abstract:
We investigate the behavior of countable Borel equivalence relations (CBERs)
on topological Ramsey spaces. First, we give a simple proof of the fact that
every CBER on $[\mathbb{N}]^{\mathbb{N}}$ is hyperfinite on some set of the
form $[A]^{\mathbb{N}}$. Using the idea behind the proof, we show the analogous
result for every topological Ramsey space.
